I think it's safe to predict that Barack Obama will be the nominee of the Democratic Party, but he could be a stronger nominee if he receives a strong challenge in the primary. Dennis Kucinich did not say who that potential challenger might be. Former Russ Feingold ( D-Wis.) has been mentioned as a possible 2012 challenger but he has said he does not want to run. Sen.
